It's working

This one too

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'new-instance', templateUrl: './new-instance.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-instance.component.scss'] }) export class NewInstanceComponent { @Input() buttonInfo : string; screenVisible : boolean = false; toggleScreen(e: any){ if(this.screenVisible){ if(e.srcElement == 'div.overlay'){ this.screenVisible = !this.screenVisible; } } else{ this.screenVisible = !this.screenVisible; } console.log(e); } }
